articles.author: Seb Starcevic
articles.title: Trump demands $500B in rare earths from Ukraine for continued support - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “We have to get something. We can’t continue to pay this money,” U.S. president says.
articles.content:
Otherwise, we're stupid. I said to them we have to 'we have to get something. We cant continue to pay this money,' he added.
